mapper.select: /* QUERY ID : getRefundList */ SELECT a.refund_id refundId, a.booth_id boothId, c.booth_name boothName, d.group_id groupId, d.group_name groupName, DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(a.refund_dt, '%d/%m/%Y'), '%Y/%m/%d') refundDt, a.req_firstname reqFirstname, a.req_lastname reqLastname, a.req_postcd reqPostcd, a.req_state reqState, a.req_suburb reqSuburb, a.req_street_no reqStreetNo, a.req_contact_info reqContactInfo, a.refund_reason refundReason, a.refund_amount refundAmount, a.refund_status refundStatus, b.code_name refundStatusName, a.create_dt createDt, a.update_dt updateDt, a.creator creator, DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(a.req_dt, '%d/%m/%Y'), '%Y/%m/%d') reqDt FROM ptm_refund a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT code_value, code_name FROM frwk_cmm_code WHERE system_cd = 'PHOTOME' AND category_cd = 'REFUND_STATUS') b ON b.code_value = a.refund_status LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT booth_id, booth_name, group_id, use_yn FROM ptm_booth_info ) c ON c.booth_id = a.booth_id LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT group_id, group_name, use_yn FROM ptm_booth_group ) d ON d.group_id = c.group_id WHERE c.use_yn = 'Y' AND d.use_yn = 'Y' AND c.group_id = #{groupId} AND c.booth_id = #{boothId} AND a.req_firstname LIKE CONCAT('%','${reqFirstname}', '%') AND a.req_postcd = #{reqPostcd} AND a.req_state = #{reqState} AND a.req_suburb LIKE CONCAT('%','${reqSuburb}', '%') AND a.refund_status = #{refundStatus} AND DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(a.req_dt, '%d/%m/%Y'),'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#{fromReqDt}, '%d/%m/%Y'),'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#{toReqDt}, '%d/%m/%Y'),'%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY STR_TO_DATE(a.req_dt, '%d/%m/%Y') DESC, d.group_name ASC, c.booth_name ASC

/* QUERY ID : getRefundInfo */ SELECT a.refund_id refundId, a.booth_id boothId, c.booth_name boothName, d.group_id groupId, d.group_name groupName, a.refund_dt refundDt, a.req_firstname reqFirstname, a.req_lastname reqLastname, a.req_postcd reqPostcd, a.req_state reqState, a.req_suburb reqSuburb, a.req_street_no reqStreetNo, a.req_contact_info reqContactInfo, a.refund_reason refundReason, a.refund_amount refundAmount, a.refund_status refundStatus, b.code_name refundStatusName, a.create_dt createDt, a.update_dt updateDt, a.creator creator, a.req_dt reqDt FROM ptm_refund a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT code_value, code_name FROM frwk_cmm_code WHERE system_cd = 'PHOTOME' AND category_cd = 'REFUND_STATUS') b ON b.code_value = a.refund_status LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT booth_id, booth_name, group_id FROM ptm_booth_info ) c ON c.booth_id = a.booth_id LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT group_id, group_name FROM ptm_booth_group ) d ON d.group_id = c.group_id WHERE refund_id = #{refundId}
/* QUERY ID : getNewRefundId */ SELECT (coalesce(max(refund_id), 0) + 1) FROM ptm_refund;
mapper.insert: /* QUERY ID : registRefundInfo */ INSERT INTO ptm_refund(refund_id, booth_id, refund_dt, req_firstname, req_lastname, req_postcd, req_state, req_suburb, req_street_no, req_contact_info, refund_reason, refund_amount, refund_status, creator, req_dt) VALUES (#{refundId}, #{boothId}, #{refundDt}, #{reqFirstname}, #{reqLastname}, #{reqPostcd}, #{reqState}, #{reqSuburb}, #{reqStreetNo}, #{reqContactInfo}, #{refundReason}, #{refundAmount}, #{refundStatus}, #{creator}, #{reqDt})
mapper.update: /* QUERY ID : updateRefundInfo */ UPDATE ptm_refund SET booth_id = #{boothId}, refund_dt = #{refundDt}, req_firstname = #{reqFirstname}, req_lastname = #{reqLastname}, req_postcd = #{reqPostcd}, req_state = #{reqState}, req_suburb = #{reqSuburb}, req_street_no = #{reqStreetNo}, req_contact_info = #{reqContactInfo}, refund_reason = #{refundReason}, refund_amount = #{refundAmount}, refund_status = #{refundStatus}, update_dt = #{updateDt}, creator = #{creator}, req_dt = #{reqDt}, update_dt = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE refund_id = #{refundId}
mapper.delete: /* QUERY ID : deleteRefundInfo */ DELETE FROM ptm_refund WHERE refund_id = #{refundId}
